title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Labor MP Peter Khalil says Shadow Resources Minister Joel Fitzgibbon is “perfectly entitled to put forward policy ideas”. Mr Fitzgibbon will use a speech in Sydney on Wednesday to call on his colleagues to endorse the Coalition's 2030 emissions reduction target. Mr Khalil told Sky News “under the coalition, emissions have risen, whereas when we were in power last, we actually reduced emissions”. “We need to make sure that people get jobs in the new energy sector… because we are the party of the working class and we need to make sure there are real jobs available to them,” he said. Image: News Corp Australia
